DOC.brief_summary: An Open-label , single dose clinical trial investigate pharmacokinetics effect ECG escitalopram oral administration elderly volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetics Effect ECG Escitalopram Elderly Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy subject age 65 old screen A body weight range 50 kg ( inclusive ) 90 kg ( inclusive ) BMI range 19.0 28.0 subject decide participate voluntarily write informed consent form subject clinically significant disease cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , endocrinological , hematological , gastrointestinal , neurological ( central nervous system ) , psychiatric disorder malignant tumor Subject judge eligible study participation investigator
